trans-unit.source: When used with modification_time, indicates the time format that must be used.
trans-unit.target: 与 modification_time 一起使用时，指示必须使用的时间格式。

trans-unit.source: When used with state=absent the remote with that name will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 当与state = absence一起使用时，具有该名称的遥控器将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When used with state=absent, it is recommended to specify the name in the reverse DNS format.
trans-unit.target: 与state = absent一起使用时，建议以反向DNS格式指定名称。

trans-unit.source: When used with state=absent, this is not required.
trans-unit.target: 与state = absent一起使用时，这不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: When used with state=present, name can be specified as an http(s) URL to a flatpakref file or the unique reverse DNS name that identifies a flatpak.
trans-unit.target: 当与state = present一起使用时，可以将名称指定为 flatpakref 文件的 http(s URL 或标识Flatpak的唯一反向DNS名称。

trans-unit.source: When used with state=present, the flatpak remote specified under the flatpakrepo_url is added using the specified installation method.
trans-unit.target: 与state = present 一起使用时，将使用指定的安装 method 添加flatpakrepo_url下指定的flatpak远程。

trans-unit.source: When used with state=present, the remote will be added to the managed host under the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 与state = present一起使用时，将以指定名称将远程添加到托管主机。

trans-unit.source: When used with a loop: each package will be processed individually, it is much more efficient to pass the list directly to the name option.
trans-unit.target: 当与 loop: 一起使用时：每个包将被单独处理，将列表直接传递给 name 选项会更有效。

trans-unit.source: When used with absent, the account will be deleted if admin_password is also provided.
trans-unit.target: 当与absent一起使用时,如果同时提供了admin_password,账户将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When used with absent, the account will be deleted if admin_user_name is also provided.
trans-unit.target: 当与absent一起使用时,如果同时提供了admin_user_name,账户将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When used with other attributes, the value of this key will get precedence and the other keys will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当与其他属性一起使用时,该键的值将获得优先权,其他键将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the number of stale requests tolerated.
trans-unit.target: 当与有界呆滞性一致性级别一起使用时,该值表示可容忍的呆滞请求数量。

trans-unit.source: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the time amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated.
trans-unit.target: 当与 "有界呆滞性 "一致性水平一起使用时,该值表示可容忍的呆滞性时间量(以秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: When used with the other key properties of the class, the property allows all instances of this class
trans-unit.target: 当与该类的其他关键属性一起使用时,该属性允许该类的所有实例的

trans-unit.source: When used without other conditions it is equivalent of just sleeping.
trans-unit.target: 在没有其他条件的情况下使用,就相当于只是睡觉。

trans-unit.source: When used without other conditions, it is equivalent of just sleeping.
trans-unit.target: 如果在没有其他条件的情况下使用,就相当于只是睡觉。

trans-unit.source: When user does not exist and not check mode
trans-unit.target: 当用户不存在且没有检查模式时

trans-unit.source: When user exists
trans-unit.target: 当用户存在时

trans-unit.source: When using ‘with_*’ loops be aware that if you do not set a unique mark the block will be overwritten on each iteration.
trans-unit.target: 使用'with_ *'循环时，请注意，如果未设置唯一标记，则该块将在每次迭代时被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: When using ansible-vault commands that encrypt content (ansible-vault encrypt, ansible-vault encrypt_string, etc) only one vault-id can be used.
trans-unit.target: 当使用对内容加密的ansible -vault命令（ansible-vault加密，ansible-vault crypto_string等）时，只能使用一个vault-id。

trans-unit.source: When using aggregates if one of the aggregate definitions is invalid, the aggregate run will fail, indicating the error it last encountered.
trans-unit.target: 使用 aggregates 如果其中一个聚合定义无效，则聚合运行将失败，表明它最后遇到的错误。

trans-unit.source: When using aggregates, if one of the aggregate definitions is invalid, the aggregate run will fail, indicating the error it last encountered.
trans-unit.target: 使用 aggregates ，如果其中一个聚合定义无效，则聚合运行将失败，表明它最后遇到的错误。

trans-unit.source: When using become_user to a user other than root, the module arguments are briefly written into a random tempfile in /tmp. These are deleted immediately after the command is executed. This only occurs when changing privileges from a user like ‘bob’ to ‘timmy’, not when going from ‘bob’ to ‘root’, or logging in directly as ‘bob’ or ‘root’. If it concerns you that this data is briefly readable (not writable), avoid transferring unencrypted passwords with become_user set. In other cases, /tmp is not used and this does not come into play. Ansible also takes care to not log password parameters.
trans-unit.target: 将 become_user root以外的用户时，模块参数将简短地写入 /tmp 中的随机tempfile中。这些命令执行后立即删除。仅当将特权从“ bob”用户更改为“ timmy”时发生，而不是从“ bob”更改为“ root”，或直接以“ bob”或“ root”身份登录时，才会发生这种情况。如果您担心此数据是短暂可读（不可写）的，请避免使用 become_user 设置传输未加密的密码。在其他情况下，不使用 /tmp ，这也不起作用。 Ansible还注意不要记录密码参数。

trans-unit.source: When using dir, this module will, by default, recursively go through each sub directory and load up the variables. By explicitly setting the depth, this module will only go as deep as the depth.
trans-unit.target: 使用 dir 时，默认情况下，此模块将递归地遍历每个子目录并加载变量。通过显式设置深度，此模块将仅达到深度。

trans-unit.source: When using dist-upgrade, name should be '*'.
trans-unit.target: 使用 dist-upgrade 时，名称应为 '*' 。

trans-unit.source: When using gssapi, run kinit before running Ansible to get a valid Kerberos ticket.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gssapi 时，请在运行Ansible之前运行 kinit 以获得有效的Kerberos票证。

trans-unit.source: When using ldap, it is recommended to set auth=gssapi, or start_tls=yes, otherwise traffic will be in plaintext.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ldap 时，建议设置 auth=gssapi 或 start_tls=yes ，否则流量将采用纯文本格式。

trans-unit.source: When using rax.py, you will not have a ‘localhost’ defined in the inventory.
trans-unit.target: 使用 rax.py 时，清单中将没有定义“ localhost”。

trans-unit.source: When using scheme=ldaps or start_tls=yes, this controls the certificate validation behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 使用 scheme=ldaps 或 start_tls=yes 时，这将控制证书验证行为。

trans-unit.source: When using simple, the username and password options must be set. If not using scheme=ldaps or start_tls=True then these credentials are exposed in plaintext in the network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 使用 simple 时，必须设置用户名和密码选项。如果未使用 scheme=ldaps 或 start_tls=True ,则这些凭据将以纯文本格式显示在网络流量中。

trans-unit.source: When using state=clean, the releases are ordered by creation date. You should be able to switch to a new naming strategy without problems.
trans-unit.target: 使用 state=clean 时，发布按创建日期排序。您应该能够毫无问题地切换到新的命名策略。

trans-unit.source: When using state=latest, this can be '*', which updates all installed packages managed by pkgutil.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 state=latest 时，它可以是 '*' ，它将更新由pkgutil管理的所有已安装软件包。

trans-unit.source: When using vars: within the roles: section of a playbook, the variables are added to the play variables, making them available to all tasks within the play before and after the role. This behavior can be changed by DEFAULT_PRIVATE_ROLE_VARS.
trans-unit.target: 在剧本的 roles: 部分中使用 vars: 时，会将变量添加到play变量中，使它们可用于角色之前和之后的所有任务。可以通过DEFAULT_PRIVATE_ROLE_VARS更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: When using version in a playbook or role, don’t use {{ }} as described in the FAQ:
trans-unit.target: 在剧本或角色中使用 version 时，请勿按照常见问题解答中的说明使用 {{ }} ：

trans-unit.source: When using client_authenticator_typeclient-secret (the default), you can specify a secret here (otherwise one will be generated if it does not exit). If changing this secret, the module will not register a change currently (but the changed secret will be saved).
trans-unit.target: 使用client_authenticator_type client-secret （默认值）时，您可以在此处指定一个秘密（否则，如果不退出，则会生成一个秘密）。如果更改此机密，则模块当前不会注册更改（但更改的机密将被保存）。

trans-unit.source: When using Ansible to manage Windows, many of the syntax and rules that apply for Unix/Linux hosts also apply to Windows, but there are still some differences when it comes to components like path separators and OS-specific tasks. This document covers details specific to using Ansible for Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在使用Ansible管理Windows时,许多适用于Unix/Linux主机的语法和规则也适用于Windows,但在涉及到路径分隔符和操作系统特定任务等组件时,仍然存在一些差异。本文档涵盖了使用Ansible for Windows的具体细节。

trans-unit.source: When using Ansible with CloudFormation, typically Ansible will be used with a tool like Packer to build images, and CloudFormation will launch those images, or ansible will be invoked through user data once the image comes online, or a combination of the two.
trans-unit.target: 在使用Ansible与CloudFormation时,通常Ansible会与Packer等工具一起构建镜像,CloudForm会启动这些镜像,或者镜像上线后,通过用户数据调用ansible,或者两者相结合。

trans-unit.source: When using Basic or Certificate authentication, make sure that the user is a local account and not a domain account. Domain accounts do not work with Basic and Certificate authentication.
trans-unit.target: 当使用Basic或Certificate认证时,请确保用户是本地账户而不是域账户。域账户不能使用Basic和Certificate认证。

trans-unit.source: When using MIPs, cluster APIs are expected to fail with ‘xUnknownAPIMethod method=ListAccounts’
trans-unit.target: 使用MIP时，群集API可能会因“ xUnknownAPIMethod method = ListAccounts”而失败

trans-unit.source: When using RackConnect version 2 or Rackspace Managed Cloud there are Rackspace automation tasks that are executed on the servers you create after they are successfully built. If your automation executes before the RackConnect or Managed Cloud automation, you can cause failures and un-usable servers.
trans-unit.target: 当使用RackConnect版本2或Rackspace Managed Cloud时,有一些Rackspace自动化任务会在您创建的服务器成功构建后执行。如果你的自动化任务在RackConnect或Managed Cloud自动化任务之前执行,你可能会导致失败和无法使用的服务器。

trans-unit.source: When using RackConnect version 2 or Rackspace Managed Cloud there are Rackspace automation tasks that are executed on the servers you create after they are successfully built. If your automation executes before the RackConnect or Managed Cloud automation, you can cause failures and unusable servers.
trans-unit.target: 当使用RackConnect版本2或Rackspace Managed Cloud时,有一些Rackspace自动化任务会在您创建的服务器成功构建后执行。如果你的自动化任务在RackConnect或Managed Cloud自动化之前执行,你可能会导致失败和无法使用服务器。

trans-unit.source: When using SANtricity Web Services Proxy, use netapp_eseries.santricity.na_santricity_storage_system to update management paths. This is required because of a known issue and will be addressed in the proxy version 4.1. After the resolution the management ports should automatically be updated.
trans-unit.target: 当使用SANtricity Web Services Proxy时,使用netapp_eseries.santricity.na_santricity_storage_system更新管理路径。这是因为一个已知的问题,并将在代理4.1版本中解决。解决后,管理端口应该会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: When using SSH key authentication with Ansible, the remote session won’t have access to the user’s credentials and will fail when attempting to access a network resource. This is also known as the double-hop or credential delegation issue. There are two ways to work around this issue:
trans-unit.target: 当将SSH密钥身份验证与Ansible结合使用时，远程会话将无权访问用户的凭据，并且在尝试访问网络资源时将失败。这也称为双跳或凭据委派问题。有两种方法可以解决此问题：

trans-unit.source: When using a client other than the primary client, the org parameter cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用主要客户端以外的其他客户端时，无法指定org参数。

trans-unit.source: When using a normal string (without quotes), YAML will not consider the backslash an escape character.
trans-unit.target: 当使用一个正常的字符串(没有引号)时,YAML不会将反斜杠视为转义字符。

trans-unit.source: When using a strategy such as free, host_pinned, or a custom strategy, host results will be added to new task results in .plays[].tasks[]. As such, there will exist duplicate task objects indicated by duplicate task IDs at .plays[].tasks[].task.id, each with an individual host result for the task.
trans-unit.target: 使用免费，host_pinned或自定义策略等策略时，主机结果将添加到 .plays[].tasks[] 新任务结果中。这样，在 .plays[].tasks[].task.id 处将存在由重复的任务ID指示的重复任务对象，每个任务ID都有该任务的单独宿主结果。

trans-unit.source: When using an io1volume_type this sets the number of IOPS provisioned for the volume
trans-unit.target: 使用 io1 volume_type时，这将设置为该卷配置的IOPS数量

trans-unit.source: When using auth_mode=none, it will restore the default DLDP authentication mode. By default, DLDP packets are not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 当使用auth_mode=none时,将恢复默认的DLDP认证模式。默认情况下,DLDP数据包是不进行认证的。

trans-unit.source: When using become or CredSSP, the task will have access to any local credentials stored in the user’s vault.
trans-unit.target: 当使用begin或CredSSP时，该任务将有权访问存储在用户保管库中的任何本地凭据。

trans-unit.source: When using ca_cert on OS X it has been reported that in some conditions the validate will always succeed.
trans-unit.target: 当在OS X上使用ca_cert时,据说在某些情况下,验证总会成功。

trans-unit.source: When using connection local, ANSIBLE_PERSISTENT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT and ANSIBLE_PERSISTENT_COMMAND_TIMEOUT can only be set using ENV variables or the ansible.cfg file.
trans-unit.target: 当使用连接本地时,ANSIBLE_PERSISTENT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT和ANSIBLE_PERSISTENT_COMMAND_TIMEOUT只能使用ENV变量或ansible.cfg文件来设置。

trans-unit.source: When using double quotes ", the backslash is considered an escape character and needs to escaped with another backslash.
trans-unit.target: 当使用双引号 " ，反斜杠被认为是转义字符，需要用另一个反斜杠进行转义。

trans-unit.source: When using git you can specify the clone depth as an integer here.
trans-unit.target: 当使用git时,你可以在这里指定克隆深度为一个整数。

trans-unit.source: When using handlers within roles, note that:
trans-unit.target: 在角色中使用处理程序时,请注意:

trans-unit.source: When using in a chroot environment you always need to specify the full name i.e. (crond.service).
trans-unit.target: 当在chroot环境中使用时,你总是需要指定全名,即(crond.service)。

trans-unit.source: When using latest, only update installed packages. Do not install packages.
trans-unit.target: 使用最新版本时,只更新已安装的软件包。不要安装软件包。

trans-unit.source: When using loops in combination with a value like "[('xkb', 'us'), ('xkb', 'se')]", you need to be aware of possible type conversions. Applying a filter "{{ item.value | string }}" to the parameter variable can avoid potential conversion problems.
trans-unit.target: 当将循环与诸如 "[('xkb', 'us'), ('xkb', 'se')]" 类的值组合使用时，您需要注意可能的类型转换。将过滤器 "{{ item.value | string }}" 应用于参数变量可以避免潜在的转换问题。

trans-unit.source: When using persistent connections with Paramiko, the connection runs in a background process. If the host doesn’t already have a valid SSH key, by default Ansible will prompt to add the host key. This will cause connections running in background processes to fail.
trans-unit.target: 当与Paramiko使用永久连接时，该连接在后台进程中运行。如果主机尚没有有效的SSH密钥，则默认情况下，Ansible将提示您添加主机密钥。这将导致在后台进程中运行的连接失败。

trans-unit.source: When using pkgsite, be careful that already in cache packages won’t be downloaded again.
trans-unit.target: 使用pkgsite时，请注意不要再次下载缓存包中已存在的软件包。

trans-unit.source: When using privilege escalation (become) a default shell will be assigned if one is not provided as privilege escalation requires a shell.
trans-unit.target: 当使用特权升级（ become ）时，如果不提供特权，则将分配默认的shell，因为特权升级需要shell。

trans-unit.source: When using regexen, the pattern MUST match the ENTIRE file name, not just parts of it. So if you are looking to match all files ending in .default, you'd need to use '.*\.default' as a regexp and not just '\.default'.
trans-unit.target: 当使用regexen时,模式必须匹配完整的文件名,而不仅仅是其中的一部分。因此,如果你想匹配所有以.default结尾的文件,你需要使用'.*//.default'作为regexp,而不仅仅是'\.default'。

trans-unit.source: When using single quotes ', YAML will not consider the backslash an escape character.
trans-unit.target: 当使用单引号 ' 时，YAML不会将反斜杠视为转义字符。

trans-unit.source: When using state:absent to delete VPN target attributes, ensure the configuration of VPN target attributes has existed and otherwise it will report an error.
trans-unit.target: 使用state:absent删除VPN目标属性时,要确保VPN目标属性的配置已经存在,否则会报错。

trans-unit.source: When using state:absent, evpn is not supported and it will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当使用state:absence时,不支持evpn,会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When using state=latest, this can be '*', which updates all installed packages.
trans-unit.target: 当使用state=latest时,可以是'*',这样可以更新所有安装的软件包。

trans-unit.source: When using state=latest, this can be '*' which means run yum -y update.
trans-unit.target: 当使用state = latest时，它可以是 '*' ，这意味着运行 yum -y update 。

trans-unit.source: When using symbols such as %, they must be properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: 当使用%等符号时,必须正确转义。

trans-unit.source: When using the -p option to specify the install path, use one of the values configured in COLLECTIONS_PATHS, as this is where Ansible itself will expect to find collections. If you don’t specify a path, ansible-galaxy collection install installs the collection to the first path defined in COLLECTIONS_PATHS, which by default is ~/.ansible/collections
trans-unit.target: 使用 -p 选项指定安装路径时，请使用COLLECTIONS_PATHS中配置的值之一，因为这是Ansible本身期望查找集合的位置。如果您未指定路径，则 ansible-galaxy collection install 会将集合安装到COLLECTIONS_PATHS中定义的第一个路径，默认情况下为 ~/.ansible/collections

trans-unit.source: When using the ansible-playbook --diff command line argument the module can generate diffs against different sources.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 ansible-playbook --diff 命令行参数时，模块可以针对不同源生成差异。

trans-unit.source: When using the ansible-playbook --diff command line argument, the module can generate diffs against different sources.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 ansible-playbook --diff 命令行参数时，模块可以针对不同源生成差异。

trans-unit.source: When using the cryptography backend, the following key types require at least the following cryptography version: RSA keys: cryptography >= 1.4 DSA and ECDSA keys: cryptography >= 1.5 ed448 and ed25519 keys: cryptography >= 2.6
trans-unit.target: 使用 cryptography 后端时，以下密钥类型至少需要以下 cryptography 版本：RSA密钥： cryptography > = 1.4 DSA和ECDSA密钥： cryptography > = 1.5 ed448和ed25519密钥： cryptography > = 2.6

trans-unit.source: When using the cryptography backend, use auto.
trans-unit.target: 使用 cryptography 后端时，请使用 auto 。

trans-unit.source: When using the nagios module you will need to specify your Nagios server using the delegate_to parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 nagios 模块，您将需要使用指定Nagios服务器 delegate_to 参数。

trans-unit.source: When using the ODJ BLOB to join a computer to the domain, it must be written out to a file.
trans-unit.target: 当使用ODJ BLOB将一台计算机加入域时,必须将其写入文件。

trans-unit.source: When using the YAML syntax for tasks, the rules are well-defined by the YAML standard:
trans-unit.target: 当使用YAML语法进行任务时,YAML标准对规则进行了很好的定义。

trans-unit.source: When using the ec2 inventory script, hosts automatically appear in groups based on how they are tagged in EC2.
trans-unit.target: 使用ec2清单脚本时,主机会根据它们在EC2中的标记方式自动出现在组中。

trans-unit.source: When using the inventory plugin, you can configure extra inventory structure based on the metadata returned by AWS.
trans-unit.target: 使用库存插件时,可以根据AWS返回的元数据配置额外的库存结构。

trans-unit.source: When using the module please select the appropriate link_aggregation_type (lag_type). link for Port Channel(PC), node for Virtual Port Channel(VPC) and leaf for Leaf Access Port Policy Group.
trans-unit.target: 使用模块时，请选择适当的link_aggregation_type（lag_type）。端口通道（PC）的 link ，虚拟端口通道（VPC）的 node 和 leaf 访问端口策略组的叶。

trans-unit.source: When using the preset_only option, hostname/username/password are required but not used.
trans-unit.target: 当使用preset_only选项时,需要主机名/用户名/密码,但不使用。

trans-unit.source: When using this method, any failed or unreachable task will invoke the debugger, unless otherwise explicitly disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当使用此方法时,任何失败或无法到达的任务都会调用调试器,除非另有明确的禁用。

trans-unit.source: When using this parameter, you change the default value used by dialect.
trans-unit.target: 使用此参数时，可以更改 dialect 使用的默认值。

trans-unit.source: When using variables for the target file or role name, variables from inventory sources (host/group vars, etc.) cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 当对目标文件或角色名称使用变量时,不能使用来自清单源的变量(主机/组变量等)。

trans-unit.source: When using verbosity 2 or less (-vv) the stdout output will be restricted. When using verbosity 4 (-vvvv) the stdout output will be more verbose. When using verbosity 5 (-vvvvv) the stdout output will include debug output.
trans-unit.target: 当使用详细度2或更小（ -vv ）时， stdout 输出将受到限制。使用详细程度4（ -vvvv ）时， stdout 输出将更加详细。使用详细级别5（ -vvvvv ）时， stdout 输出将包括调试输出。

trans-unit.source: When utilizing a standard ini formatted inventory file (as opposed to the inventory plugin), it may still be advantageous to retrieve discoverable hostvar information from the Rackspace API.
trans-unit.target: 当使用标准的ini格式的清单文件时(与清单插件相反),从Rackspace API中检索可发现的hostvar信息可能仍然是有利的。

trans-unit.source: When verifying the authenticity of the Docker Host server, provide the expected name of the server.
trans-unit.target: 在验证Docker Host服务器的真实性时,提供服务器的预期名称。

trans-unit.source: When verifying the authenticity of the Docker Host server, provide the expected name of the server. Defaults to ‘localhost’.

trans-unit.source: When you add a tag to an include_role task, Ansible applies the tag only to the include itself. This means you can pass --tags to run only selected tasks from the role, if those tasks themselves have the same tag as the include statement. See Selectively running tagged tasks in re-usable files for details.
trans-unit.target: When you add a tag to an include_role task, Ansible applies the tag only to the include itself. This means you can pass --tags to run only selected tasks from the role, if those tasks themselves have the same tag as the include statement. See Selectively running tagged tasks in re-usable files for details.

trans-unit.source: When you add a conditional to an import statement, Ansible applies the condition to all tasks within the imported file. This behavior is the equivalent of Tag inheritance: adding tags to multiple tasks. Ansible applies the condition to every task, and evaluates each task separately. For example, you might have a playbook called main.yml and a tasks file called other_tasks.yml:
trans-unit.target: When you add a conditional to an import statement, Ansible applies the condition to all tasks within the imported file. trans-unit.source: When you add a tag to an import_role statement, Ansible applies the tag to all tasks within the role. See Tag inheritance: adding tags to multiple tasks for details.
trans-unit.target: When you add a tag to an import_role statement, Ansible applies the tag to all tasks within the role. See Tag inheritance: adding tags to multiple tasks for details.

trans-unit.source: When you add a tag to the role option, Ansible applies the tag to ALL tasks within the role.
trans-unit.target: When you add a tag to the role option, Ansible applies the tag to ALL tasks within the role.

trans-unit.source: When you apply tags: attributes to structures other than tasks, Ansible processes the tag attribute to apply ONLY to the tasks they contain. Applying tags anywhere other than tasks is just a convenience so you don’t have to tag tasks individually.
trans-unit.target: 当您将 tags: 属性应用于任务以外的结构时，Ansible处理tag属性以仅应用于它们包含的任务。在任务以外的任何地方应用标签只是一种方便，因此您不必单独标记任务。

trans-unit.source: When you are testing new plays or debugging playbooks, you may need to run the same play multiple times. To make this more efficient, Ansible offers two alternative ways to execute a playbook: start-at-task and step mode.
trans-unit.target: 当你在测试新的剧本或调试剧本时,你可能需要多次运行同一个剧本。为了提高这种效率,Ansible提供了两种可供选择的执行剧本的方式:任务开始模式和步骤模式。

trans-unit.source: When you are using a SNAT or SNAT pool, the server-side source address is translated first and then the OneConnect mask is applied to the translated address.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用SNAT或SNAT池时,首先翻译服务器端源地址,然后将OneConnect掩码应用于翻译后的地址。

trans-unit.source: When you are using absent for os_volume, you need to make sure that SD is not attached to the data center!
trans-unit.target: 当使用os_volume缺席时，需要确保SD未连接到数据中心！

trans-unit.source: When you can do something simply, do something simply. Do not reach to use every feature of Ansible together, all at once. Use what works for you. For example, you will probably not need vars, vars_files, vars_prompt and --extra-vars all at once, while also using an external inventory file.
trans-unit.target: 当您可以简单地做某事时，请简单地做某事。不要一次全部使用Ansible的所有功能。使用对您有用的东西。例如，您可能不需要一次使用 vars ， vars_files ， vars_prompt 和 --extra-vars ，同时还可以使用外部清单文件。

trans-unit.source: When you choose to use your username and password, your password is not sent to Galaxy. It is used to authenticates with GitHub and create a personal access token. It then sends the token to Galaxy, which in turn verifies that your identity and returns a Galaxy access token. After authentication completes the GitHub token is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 当您选择使用您的用户名和密码时,您的密码不会被发送到Galaxy。它是用来验证GitHub的身份并创建一个个人访问令牌。然后它将令牌发送给Galaxy,Galaxy再验证你的身份并返回一个Galaxy访问令牌。认证完成后,GitHub令牌会被销毁。

trans-unit.source: When you create a data disk with the azure_rm_manageddisk module, you need to explicitly specify the storage_account_type parameter to make it a managed disk. Otherwise, the data disk will be an unmanaged disk.
trans-unit.target: When you create a data disk with the azure_rm_manageddisk module, you need to explicitly specify the storage_account_type parameter to make it a managed disk. Otherwise, the data disk will be an unmanaged disk.

trans-unit.source: When you create an IP address with the azure_rm_publicipaddress module, you must set the sku parameter to standard. Otherwise, the IP address cannot be used in an availability zone.
trans-unit.target: When you create an IP address with the azure_rm_publicipaddress module, you must set the sku parameter to standard . Otherwise, the IP address cannot be used in an availability zone.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance, you must create it in a subnet, and the instance draws its internal IP address from that subnet.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个实例时,你必须在一个子网中创建它,实例从这个子网中抽取它的内部IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When you create network modules for a new platform, or modify the connections provided by an existing network platform(such as network_cli and httpapi), you also need to update the Settings by Platform table and add or modify the Platform Options file for your platform.
trans-unit.target: 当您为新平台创建网络模块或修改现有网络平台提供的连接（例如 network_cli 和 httpapi ）时，您还需要更新“按平台设置”表并为您的平台添加或修改“平台选项”文件。

trans-unit.source: When you define variables in a playbook, they are visible to anyone who runs that playbook. This is especially useful if you share playbooks widely.
trans-unit.target: 当您在剧本中定义变量时,任何运行该剧本的人都可以看到它们。如果你广泛地共享游戏手册,这一点特别有用。

trans-unit.source: When you enable one or more limit settings, the system then uses that data to take members in and out of service.
trans-unit.target: 当您启用一个或多个限制设置时,系统就会使用这些数据将会员带入和退出服务。

trans-unit.source: When you enable one or more limit settings, the system then uses that data to take servers in and out of service.
trans-unit.target: 当您启用一个或多个限制设置时,系统就会使用这些数据来使服务器进入和退出服务。

trans-unit.source: When you enable synchronization, the system periodically queries other systems in the synchronization group to obtain and distribute configuration and metrics collection updates.
trans-unit.target: 启用同步后,系统会定期查询同步组中的其他系统,以获取和分发配置和指标收集更新。

trans-unit.source: When you enable the debugger globally, every failed task invokes the debugger, unless the role, play, block, or task explicity disables the debugger. If you need more granular control over what conditions trigger the debugger, use the debugger keyword.
trans-unit.target: When you enable the debugger globally, every failed task invokes the debugger, unless the role, play, block, or task explicity disables the debugger. If you need more granular control over what conditions trigger the debugger, use the debugger keyword.

trans-unit.source: When you execute Ansible through an ad-hoc command or by running a playbook, you must choose which managed nodes or groups you want to execute against. Patterns let you run commands and playbooks against specific hosts and/or groups in your inventory. An Ansible pattern can refer to a single host, an IP address, an inventory group, a set of groups, or all hosts in your inventory. Patterns are highly flexible - you can exclude or require subsets of hosts, use wildcards or regular expressions, and more. Ansible executes on all inventory hosts included in the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 当您通过特设命令或通过运行playbook执行Ansible时,您必须选择要针对哪些受管节点或组执行。模式可让您针对清单中的特定主机和/或组运行命令和游戏本。一个Ansible模式可以指一个主机、一个IP地址、一个清单组、一组组或清单中的所有主机。模式非常灵活-您可以排除或要求主机子集,使用通配符或正则表达式等。Ansible会在模式中包含的所有库存主机上执行。

The data structure placed in the variable during the loop will contain a results attribute, that is a list of all responses from the module. For a more in-depth example of how this works, see the Loops section on using register with a loop.

trans-unit.source: When you run a playbook, Ansible returns information about connections, the name lines of all your plays and tasks, whether each task has succeeded or failed on each machine, and whether each task has made a change on each machine. At the bottom of the playbook execution, Ansible provides a summary of the nodes that were targeted and how they performed. General failures and fatal “unreachable” communication attempts are kept separate in the counts.
trans-unit.target: When you run a playbook, Ansible returns information about connections, the name lines of all your plays and tasks, whether each task has succeeded or failed on each machine, and whether each task has made a change on each machine. At the bottom of the playbook execution, Ansible provides a summary of the nodes that were targeted and how they performed. General failures and fatal “unreachable” communication attempts are kept separate in the counts.

trans-unit.source: When you run a task or playbook that uses encrypted variables or files, you must provide the passwords to decrypt the variables or files. You can do this at the command line or in the playbook itself.
trans-unit.target: 当你运行一个使用加密变量或文件的任务或剧本时,你必须提供密码来解密变量或文件。您可以在命令行或在游戏本中这样做。

trans-unit.source: When you run a task with until and register the result as a variable, the registered variable will include a key called “attempts”, which records the number of the retries for the task.
trans-unit.target: 当你运行一个任务 until 和登记的结果作为一个变量，该变量注册的将包括一个名为“尝试”键，它记录了重试任务的数量。

trans-unit.source: When you run the playbook with ansible-playbook -i hosts myplaybook.yml --tags "mytag", Ansible skips the task with no tags, runs the tagged individual task, and runs the two tasks in the block.
trans-unit.target: When you run the playbook with ansible-playbook -i hosts myplaybook.yml --tags "mytag" , Ansible skips the task with no tags, runs the tagged individual task, and runs the two tasks in the block.

trans-unit.source: When you run the playbook, the invalid package name triggers an error, and Ansible invokes the debugger. You can fix the package name by viewing, then updating the module argument:
trans-unit.target: 当你运行playbook时,无效的包名会触发一个错误,Ansible会调用调试器。你可以通过查看,然后更新模块参数来修复包名。

trans-unit.source: When you select a cache for the system to use, you must also set enable_dns_cache to yes
trans-unit.target: 为系统选择高速缓存时，还必须将 enable_dns_cache 设置为 yes

trans-unit.source: When you set a value with environment: at the play or block level, it is available only to tasks within the play or block that are executed by the same user. The environment: keyword does not affect Ansible itself, Ansible configuration settings, the environment for other users, or the execution of other plugins like lookups and filters. Variables set with environment: do not automatically become Ansible facts, even when you set them at the play level. You must include an explicit gather_facts task in your playbook and set the environment keyword on that task to turn these values into Ansible facts.
trans-unit.target: When you set a value with environment: at the play or block level, it is available only to tasks within the play or block that are executed by the same user. The environment: keyword does not affect Ansible itself, Ansible configuration settings, the environment for other users, or the execution of other plugins like lookups and filters. Variables set with environment: do not automatically become Ansible facts, even when you set them at the play level. You must include an explicit gather_facts task in your playbook and set the environment keyword on that task to turn these values into Ansible facts.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a service policy for a LIF, you need not specify the data protocol and role for the LIF.
trans-unit.target: 当您为LIF指定服务策略时,您无需为LIF指定数据协议和角色。

trans-unit.source: When you type something directly at the command line, you may feel that your hand-crafted values should override all others, but Ansible does not work that way. Command-line options have low precedence - they override configuration only. They do not override playbook keywords, variables from inventory or variables from playbooks.
trans-unit.target: 当你直接在命令行键入一些东西时,你可能会觉得你手工制作的值应该覆盖所有其他值,但Ansible并不是这样工作的。命令行选项的优先级很低--它们只覆盖配置。它们不会覆盖playbook关键字、库存中的变量或playbook中的变量。

trans-unit.source: When you use the debugger keyword, the value you specify overrides any global configuration to enable or disable the debugger. If you define debugger at multiple levels, such as in a role and in a task, Ansible honors the most granular definition. The definition at the play or role level applies to all blocks and tasks within that play or role, unless they specify a different value. The definition at the block level overrides the definition at the play or role level, and applies to all tasks within that block, unless they specify a different value. The definition at the task level always applies to the task; it overrides the definitions at the block, play, or role level.
trans-unit.target: When you use the debugger keyword, the value you specify overrides any global configuration to enable or disable the debugger. If you define debugger at multiple levels, such as in a role and in a task, Ansible honors the most granular definition. The definition at the play or role level applies to all blocks and tasks within that play or role, unless they specify a different value. The definition at the block level overrides the definition at the play or role level, and applies to all tasks within that block, unless they specify a different value. The definition at the task level always applies to the task; it overrides the definitions at the block, play, or role level.
